name: Nans of Rage
description:
Made in December 2015 for Ludum Dare 34

This mall was once a happy, peaceful place... until one day, a powerful grandma took over. This vicious elder soon had control over the whole mall. The mall has become a center of violence and crime where no one is safe. 
Amid this turmoil, a group of determined fat police officers have sworn to clean up the mall. They are willing to risk anything... even their lives... against the... 
NANS OF RAGE!
